description:
Wrap the little ones in toasty warmth in this cozy onesie. Made from a thick fleece covered in velour fabric, the B3 Velvet traps warmth, while making layering smooth. A full zipper makes getting dressed a breeze and diaper changes a blip in their winter fun time.

  • Fluffy fleece wrapped in velour is soft, warm, and wicking
  • Full zipper with tab makes dressing and diaper changes easy
  • Flatlock seams keep the kiddos comfy and happy
  • Knit ankles and cuffs hold the onesie in place
name: Kombi B3 Velvet Fleece Onepiece - Infants
